title: ACTIVATE_AUDIO_SLOWMO_MODE
content:
0xD01005D2BA2EB7780x59A3A17D// ActivateAudioSlowmoMode
void ACTIVATE_AUDIO_SLOWMO_MODE(char* mode);Parameters:mode: A string indicating the audio slow motion mode to use, see the table.Below is a list of modes and their respective hashes.Mode (string)HashSLOWMO_BIG_SCORE_JUMP0x2B981B0CJSH_EXIT_TUNNEL_SLOWMO0x2562AA6SLOW_MO_METH_HOUSE_RAYFIRE0xDB9E1909SLOWMO_FIB4_TRUCK_SMASH0x9E144347SLOWMO_PROLOGUE_VAULT0xEA2E68E1SLOWMO_T1_RAYFIRE_EXPLOSION0xD6D358F3SLOWMO_T1_TRAILER_SMASH0xBE607345BARRY_01_SLOWMO0xD59540D4BARRY_02_SLOWMO0x12F140B3SLOWMO_EXTREME_040xF562EA50NIGEL_02_SLOWMO_SETTING0x384689B0
